apis.description: Class which provides formatting services useful in implementing functions similar to the built-in "repr()".
apis.name: reprlib.Repr
apis.signature: Repr(*, maxlevel=6, maxtuple=6, maxlist=6, maxarray=5, maxdict=4, maxset=6, maxfrozenset=6, maxdeque=6, maxstring=30, maxlong=40, maxother=30, fillvalue='...', indent=None)

apis.description: This is an instance of "Repr" which is used to provide the "repr()" function described below.
apis.name: reprlib.aRepr

apis.description: This is the method of "aRepr". It returns a string similar to that returned by the built-in function of the same name, but with limits on most sizes.
apis.name: reprlib.repr

apis.description: Decorator for "__repr__()" methods to detect recursive calls within the same thread.
apis.name: reprlib.recursive_repr

apis.description: This string is displayed for recursive references.
apis.name: reprlib.Repr.fillvalue

apis.description: Depth limit on the creation of recursive representations.
apis.name: reprlib.Repr.maxlevel

apis.description: Limits on the number of entries represented for the named object type.
apis.name:
reprlib.Repr.maxdict
reprlib.Repr.maxlist
reprlib.Repr.maxtuple
reprlib.Repr.maxset
reprlib.Repr.maxfrozenset
reprlib.Repr.maxdeque
reprlib.Repr.maxarray
apis.signature:
maxdict
maxlist
maxtuple
maxset
maxfrozenset
maxdeque
maxarray

apis.description: Maximum number of characters in the representation for an integer.
apis.name: reprlib.Repr.maxlong

apis.description: Limit on the number of characters in the representation of the string.
apis.name: reprlib.Repr.maxstring

apis.description: This limit is used to control the size of object types for which no specific formatting method is available on the "Repr" object.
apis.name: reprlib.Repr.maxother

apis.description: If this attribute is set to "None" (the default), the output is formatted with no line breaks or indentation, like the standard "repr()".
apis.name: reprlib.Repr.indent

apis.description: The equivalent of the built-in "repr()" that uses the formatting imposed by the instance.
apis.name: reprlib.Repr.repr
